mapper.select: SELECT tr.travel_route_no, tr.user_no, tr.regtime, tr.title, tr.arrive_date, tr.depart_date, tr.description, rl.title AS attraction_title, rl.latitude, rl.longitude, rl.order FROM travel_route tr LEFT JOIN route_list rl ON tr.travel_route_no = rl.travel_route_no WHERE tr.travel_route_no = #{travelRouteNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO travel_route (user_no, title, depart_date, arrive_date, description) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{title}, #{departDate}, #{arriveDate}, #{description})

insert.foreach: INSERT INTO route_list (travel_route_no, jibun, title, latitude, longitude, `order`) VALUES (#{travelRouteNo}, #{item.address}, #{item.attractionName}, #{item.latitude}, #{item.longitude}, ${index} + 1)

mapper.select: select travel_route_no, user_no, regtime, title, arrive_date, depart_date, description FROM travel_route;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM travel_route_like where travel_route_no = #{travleRouteNo} and user_no = #{userNo};
